body: The blade of this +1 keen greataxe is carved from jet-black obsidian. When the wielder charges an enemy, he receives a +10 foot enhancement bonus to his speed that round. Once per day, he can command the axe to grant all allies within 30 feet a +10 foot enhancement bonus to base speed for 1 round.
name: Swift Obsidian Greataxe
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Magic Arms and Armor/Specific Magic Weapons/Swift Obsidian Greataxe
